name: BeatTheBushes
description: Fundamentally new lost and found service
overview:
Fundamentallu new lost and found sevice

  1. What is BeatTheBushes? BeatTheBushes is a place to search for whatever or whoever you may have lost. Our service is a great way for people to help each other. It allows people to easily connect to find something that has been lost. Among our main features, we offer a subscription to updates for a given geographic area; the user receives customizable notifications whenever anyone searches for something, lost or found animals or items, within that area. On BeatTheBushes, users’ posts can contain not only the description of the item, but also the location and a photo. Moreover, users can share their posts on social networks. BeatTheBushes is available through web-interface, as well as a mobile application for iPhone.
  2. Our main functions – our users can: a. Add post that contain description, photo, and location. b. Share their own and others’ posts through social networks. c. Search on the map of the area. They can see the “who,” “what,” and “where” of each others’ posts. d. Send personal messages. They can communicate with users directly on our service. e. Receive notifications. The user can create settings and we will notify them about new posts that would be of interest.
  3. Our value-add: a. Web site and mobile application b. Search on the map c. Notifications d. Personal messages e. Integration with social networks f. Design These features make our service the most effective and convenient in this market.
  4. Why will it work? It is impossible to imagine a world where people never lose their things, or pets. The problem that we solve will always be a part of the daily human experience. Our service will facilitate and encourage a culture of social reciprocity and cohesion in society.
  5. What is the current phase of the project? At the moment, we are in the beta testing phase. We launch our sevice 1 month ago. (http://beatthebushes.com ; https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/beatthebushes-lost-and-found/id545200624?mt=8) “Farminers” (http://www.farminers.com) invested in us one year ago
  6. Our next steps: a) Develop the application for Android, WP7, Blackberry. b) Increase the audience by more than 50% a month. c) Enhance the service, adding new functionalities.
